__help.__what_comment: The direct quote or URI of the non-text object to be quoted.
__help.__when_comment: The ISO8601 formatted time when the 'what' happened.
__help.__who_comment: A URI representing the entity that caused the 'what' to happen.  Do not use @names, as they are ambiguous.
__help.__where_comment: The location of the 'what'.  If physical, this is a GeoJSON object (RFC 7946).  If not physical (telegram message, etc), this is either the URI of the message or a suitable archival-grade backup of it.
__help.__why_comment: Meta-snark about the 'what' can be put here for context, either as UTF-8 text or a URI to some other 'what'.

quotes.what: In space there is no underwriters laboratory...
burry please tweet "it only took a week for our NSFW telegram channel to devolve into arguing over linux distros"
